text: Tung na loja do Jahowa dibahen hamu marhitehite pangkataionmuna! Hape lam didok hamu dope: Marhitehite aha hulojai hami ibana? Marhitehite na nidokmuna i: Nasa siulahon hajahaton, denggan do roha ni Jahowa marnidasa, jala marlomo ni roha ibana mida nasida. Manang tung didia ma Debata na mandabu uhum?
